course_title: Special Topics w/Field: Evolution &Impact Climate Chg.
course_description: A course designed for intermediate students on topics of interest in environmental sciences. Lecture with required field trips. This course may count as an upper level field course for the ENVS major; relevant topics may count as elective credit for ENVS minors. See current course atlas.
